snippet: In her first slalom race since she won Olympic gold, Shiffrin led from start to finish at the World Cup event, just as she did for the United States at the Sochi Games two weeks ago.
abstract: Winter Sports Roundup; American skier Mikaela Shiffrin wins World Cup slalom title in Are, Swden, adding to her Olympic gold medal in the discipline just five days before her 19th birthday; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: In her first slalom race since she won Olympic gold, Shiffrin led from start to finish at the World Cup event, just as she did for the United States at the Sochi Games two weeks ago.

headline.main: Mikaela Shiffrin Retains Season’s Championship in Slalom
headline.print_headline: Shiffrin, 5 Days Shy of 19, Again Wins Season Title in Slalom
